page.prototype: .ReferenceItem as L (BYREF Item as A5Storage::DataItem, TargetPath as C)

argument.name: BYREF Item
argument.description: A DataItem that will contain the reference to the requested object.

page.description: Creates and returns a reference to an item within the container.
page.discussion: You must DIM *[xb:Item]* before making the call. No data is actually read until you ask for it.
page.example:
dim CallResult as CallResult dim SubContainer as A5Storage::SubContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::SubContainer::Open(SubContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';", "logs") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
dim Item A5Storage::DataItem = null_value() ? SubContainer.ReferenceItem(Item, "MyObjectName") = .T.
